record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Suzanne Wells from my office be given the privilege of the floor during the consideration of this legislation.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the privilege of the floor be granted to Jack Wells on my staff for the duration of the debate on the Energy bill.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that a fellow in my office, Charlie Garlow, be granted floor privileges for the duration of the Energy bill debate.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
